question: The parliament can legislate on the subject in the state list
option1: if the President issues an order authorizing it to do so
option2: if the Supreme Court of India gives authority to the Parliament of India in this regard
option3: if the Rajya Sabha passes a resolution by two-third of its to legislate on a state matter in the national interest
answer: if the Rajya Sabha passes a resolution by two-third of its to legislate on a state matter in the national interest
